tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE spare_parts_inventory (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    part_category VARCHAR(50),
    part_quantity INT,
    part_unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    part_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician_name VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    technician_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DevicePartsMap (
    device_id INT,
    part_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES Devices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (part_id) REFERENCES SparePartsInventory(part_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id, part_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    technician VARCHAR(100)
);
